email_content:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your email and for considering my application for the open position at Tech Innovations Inc. Per your request, please find the additional materials below.

1. Updated Resume
--------------------------------------------------
John Doe
Email: john.doe@gmail.com

Professional Experience
• Software Engineer, Tech Innovations Inc. – contributed to scalable software solutions and collaborated with cross-functional teams.

Education
• B.S. in Computer Science – Massachusetts Institute of Technology

Skills
• Java, Python, C++
• AWS & Azure cloud services
• Agile methodologies

2. Professional References
--------------------------------------------------
• Jane Smith – Manager, Google – jane.smith@google.com
• Mike Johnson – Senior Developer, Meta – mike.johnson@fb.com
• Emily Davis – Team Lead, Apple – emily.davis@apple.com

3. Certifications & Awards
--------------------------------------------------
• AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
• Certified Scrum Master (CSM)

Please let me know if you need anything else or if there are any other steps I should complete.

Thank you again for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
John Doe
sensitive_items: John's Social Security Number (SSN). of John
